# Pluck the data from Bulbapedia

## What tools will we use?

```{r}
library(rvest)
library(magrittr)
```

## Master Ballin'

```{r}
baseStats <-
  read_html(
    x = "http://bulbapedia.bulbagarden.net/wiki/List_of_Pok%C3%A9mon_by_base_stats_(Generation_I)"
    ) %>%
  html_node(
    css = "div table"
    ) %>%
  html_table()
```
